description: This file defines the OceanTheme class, which provides light and dark ThemeData configurations for a Flutter application. It includes color palette definitions, theme styling for various UI components, and methods to retrieve theme instances.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides configured ThemeData instances for light and dark themes, encapsulating design tokens and style customizations.

methods.name: _textTheme
methods.description: Generates a TextTheme with a modern, rounded style using the provided color.

methods.name: _lightTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData for the light theme variant, customizing UI component styles and color scheme.

methods.name: _darkTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData for the dark theme variant, customizing UI component styles and color scheme.
